description:
Angered by the loss of their teammate but in no position to fight, the remaining warriors from Universe 2 retreat and regroup. Gohan and Piccolo face off against the last two fighters from Universe 10.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gohan yo Hijou Nare! Dai 10 Uchuu to no Kessen!!
Gohan, Show No Mercy! Showdown with Universe 10!!
Gohan, zeig keine Gnade! – Showdown mit dem 10. Universum!
¡Sin piedad, Gohan! Doble duelo contra el Décimo Universo
悟飯よ非情なれ! 第10宇宙との決戦!!
